name: Villain Project
description:
Villain Project is a jigsaw puzzle game with a lot of original levels. Opposite to traditional games of the genre, in this one you'll get an image that corresponds to a piece of narrative. Each image is like a chapter of a book but when you "connect" them (you can access all images in the gallery), you'll see the adventure of a young boy trying to learn about theft, magic, and gay sex.

"In the beginning, I thought I was ready, but when I struck the wagon and I saw those hot naked men... Will my master forgive me?" [Leopold's thoughts in chapter one.]

Features


  • Original CGs;
  • Original Gay Fantasy Story;
  • Gay Threesome;
  • Sex with monsters;
  • Gallery with all scenes;
